name: Don`t Sleep
description:
A game about fighting sleep on a normal day.

Strike the sheep to avoid dozing off in the middle of your meeting! Control your tiny subconscious self, moving fast as you use a sledgehammer to fight against waves of sheeps trying to jump into your head!

--------------------------------== == ------------------------------

- W A S D keys to move your character. 

- Space bar to attack! 

- R key to enter/exit the build mode. BUILD MODE: 

- A and D keys to choose a location to your fence or mailbox turret. 

- Space bar to build!
